title: Why is Morde not allowed to be decent if Singed is allowed to be strong?
body: I'll admit, Morde's kit is a terrible ball of stats, but at least hes slow and has little kill potential due to having no mobility or CC... Singed on the other hand is absolutely oppressive to play against as a melee champion and has a kit with zero counterplay. So why is there a double standard here? Can Morde not get some minor work until his VGU?
